title: Roundish Pit
content:
Roundish Pit
This is a roundish pit. Needles of pale grey calcite spray from the rocks here and there, and gravel and chipped rock cover the ground. A twisting crawl heads right, a passage runs down, and a narrow tunnel leads ahead.

One bat, then another, settles to the ground. You shift back uneasily, but they are staying well away.
